targets.query: SELECT mean("User%") + mean("Sys%") + mean("Wait%") AS "Total", mean("User%") AS "User", mean("Sys%") AS "System", mean("Wait%") AS "Wait" FROM "CPU_ALL" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT 100 - mean("Idle%") AS " "  FROM "CPU" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("Process%") AS "Process", mean("System%") AS "System", mean("Free%") AS "Free" FROM "MEMNEW" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("Process%") AS "Process", mean("System%") AS "System", mean("Free%") AS "Free" FROM "MEMNEW" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memtotal") FROM "MEM" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memtotal") - mean("memfree")  FROM "MEM" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("swaptotal") FROM "MEM" WHERE  ("host" =~ /^$host$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("swap_total") - mean("swap_free") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("bytes_recv")) / 2 AS "Rx KB/s", non_negative_difference(mean("bytes_sent")) / 2 AS "Tx KB/s" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("read/s") AS "Read", mean("write/s") AS "Write" FROM "NETPACKET" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("read/s") AS "Read", mean("write/s") AS "Write" FROM "NETPACKET" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("read/s") AS "Read", mean("write/s") AS "Write" FROM "NETPACKET" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("read/s") AS "Read", mean("write/s") AS "Write" FROM "NETPACKET" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("read-KB/s") AS "Read-KB/s", mean("write-KB/s") AS "Write-KB/s" FROM "NET" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$nics$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "DISKREAD" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$disks$/ AND "id" != 'cd0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "DISKWRITE" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$disks$/ AND "id" != 'cd0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "DISKXFER" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$disks$/ AND "id" != 'cd0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "DISKBUSY" WHERE ("host"  =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" =~ /^$disks$/ AND "id" != 'cd0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "JFSFILE" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "id" <> '/var/adm/ras/livedump' AND "id" <> '/var/adm/ras/platform') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "id"
SELECT mean("used") / mean("total")  as "Used%" FROM "disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "path"

list.definition: show tag values from "cpu" with key = "host" where "host" =~ /$ServerType/  and "host" =~ /$DomainId/ and "host" =~ /$NodeId/
list.label: Host Name
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values from "cpu" with key = "host" where "host" =~ /$ServerType/  and "host" =~ /$DomainId/ and "host" =~ /$NodeId/

list.definition: show tag values from "net" with key = "interface"
list.label: Network Card
list.name: nics
list.query: show tag values from "net" with key = "interface"

list.definition: show tag values from "disk" with key = "device"
list.label: Hard Disk
list.name: disks
list.query: show tag values from "disk" with key = "device"

title: SDE Server Group Trend By Telegraf - Overall
